snippet.title: ShipOS 1994 Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
So you’ve been dumped with the family’s failing shipping empire and you have no idea where to start. Isn’t it funny how often things like these happen…

It happens so often in-fact that we decided to capitalise on the misfortune of you poor souls by developing ShipOS 1994, the industry’s leading integrated shipping management operating system.

Coming later this year, manage your shipping empire from the world's most advanced fleet management operating system.

#gameplay #gaming #indiegame #strategygames #videogames
